p: Hence, the Ministry of Health, the city and state Departments and regulatory agencies need to urgently standardize national regulations regarding access to beds in the exceptional case of the pandemic. Note that it is vital that a single line for ICU beds is created for the severe cases of COVID-19 due to the public, transitory and urgent need, in order to prevent hospitals keep beds idle, and ensure the fundamental right to health. This proposition is based on Article 5 th, item XXV of the FC/988, and law 8080/1990, in its Article 15, item XIII ( 23) .
